serviceDescription: Manage and interact with AI assistants, including creating new assistants, retrieving existing ones, and setting the current assistant for use.

getAssistants.description: Get a list of all assistants for the current user's company

getCurrentAssistant.description: Get the current assistant's information for the session

updateCurrentAssistant.description: Update the current assistant's information (name, description, LLM model, LLM provider, LLM prompt). Only provided fields will be updated.

askAssistant.description: Ask another assistant to handle a specific task and return the response. Useful for delegating specialized tasks to expert assistants.

getTeams.description: Get a list of all teams for the current user's company

getAssistantsByTeam.description: Get a list of assistants for a specific team
